Name: William
Text: Alright Advisor, we're ready to advance.

Name: William
Text: With the parking lot liberated, we now have Mecha-Equipment.

Name: William
Text: One of the units, the Mecha-Stapler is an indirect unit. In order to attack, it can't move.

Name: William
Text: But it has the benefit of being able to attack at range. Perform a ranged attack by selecting your stapler, then selecting the same tile it is on.

Name: William
Text: If you hold cancel (X on the keyboard or right click) ontop of the unit, you will see what tiles it can attack on their turn.

Name: William
Text: Take your time and check the range on all of our new equipment.

Name: William
Text: We're up against indirect units as well. Check the range of the enemies before making your move.

Name: William
Text: Our troops and equipment are itching to go, but we should excercise caution.

Name: William
Text: Let's move out! The finance leader is counting on us!
